snippet: Stuart Vevers reveals the secret sauce in his working environment that is transforming the brand into a fashion week talking point....
abstract: Stuart Vevers. executive creative director of Coach, discusses company's new headquarters in Hudson Yards on west side of Manhattan and how proximity to High Line has influenced his work.
lead_paragraph: Stuart Vevers reveals the secret sauce in his working environment that is transforming the brand into a fashion week talking point.

headline.main: In the Studio With the Creative Director of Coach
